original_text:
You levy a straw tax on the poor
    and impose a tax on their grain.
Therefore, though you have built stone mansions,
    you will not live in them;
though you have planted lush vineyards,
    you will not drink their wine.
korean_text: 너희가 힘없는 자를 밟고 그에게서 밀의 부당한 세를 거두었은즉 너희가 비록 다듬은 돌로 집을 건축하였으나 거기 거주하지 못할 것이요 아름다운 포도원을 가꾸었으나 그 포도주를 마시지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: You levy a straw tax on the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 가난한 자들에게 짚 세금을 부과하고

sentences.original_text: and impose a tax on their grain
though you have built stone mansions
you will not live in them
though you have planted lush vineyards
you will not drink their wine
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그 포도주를 마시지 못할 것입니다
